display_long_description:
# **Deadly Combat That Feels Incredible**
Teleport around bullets, dodge lasers, and stab evil robots with knives, arrows, grenades—even office supplies.


# **Precision Stealth Dystopian Officescape**
[media]

# **Two Full Games in One**
Budget Cuts 1 + Budget Cuts 2 combined into one seamless package—plus all DLC and mutators and content updates.
[media]


# **Endlessly Replayable Arcade Mode**
Tweak mutators, turn up difficulty, and climb the leaderboard with combat trials and stealth challenges.
[media]

# **A Darkly Funny Story of Corporate Collapse**
Experience the fall of TransCorp as humanity is "optimized" out of existence.
[media]

Join our Discord and share your runs
https://discord.com/invite/neatcorp
